data: Fort Advance, a structure built of heavy, squared timbers and some masonry, with towers at the four corners, commanding the deep ditches which had been dug around the walls, stood in the heart of the then untracked Territory of Utah.
Buffalo Bill, the Border King; Or, Redskin and Cowboy
